'''''Arda Philology 1''''' is the first volume of the journal ''[[Arda (annual)|Arda Philology]]'', and contains the proceedings of the First International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages, ''[https://www.omentielva.com/ominya.htm Omentielva Minya] ([[Omentielva]])'', which was held in Stockholm in August [[2005]].<center>'''Previous Issue''' || [[Arda Philology 2|Next Issue]] </center>
==Contents==
*Foreword
*Contents
*Contributors' Biographies
*Index Locorum
*[[Petri Tikka]]: "The Finnicization of [[Quenya]]"
*[[Nils-Lennart Johannesson]]: "Quenya, the [[Black Speech]] and the Sonority Scale"
*[[Susanne Vejdemo]]: "Tolklangs in the 'Real' World"
*[[Magnus Åberg]]: "An Analysis of [[Dwarvish]]", with an appended [[Khuzdul]] glossary
*[[Bertrand Bellet]]: "Vowel Affection in [[Sindarin]] and [[Noldorin]]"
*[[Måns Björkman]]: "The Scripts of [[Aman]]"
*[[Christopher Gilson]]: "'[[Namárië]]' and the Lexicon of Quenya"

==External links==
*[https://www.omentielva.com/ardaph1.htm Arda Philology Volume 1]
